text: @billmaher And just how many millennial children does Bill Maher have? How much skin do you have in the game brave Bill Maher? How many crowded beaches or restaurants have you been to lately? And I used to think you had good sense. Bad advice, Bill. Why add COVID-19 to death risks? Really?
